title: Expected impact of specialization and trade

content.description: As nations specialize in production and trade in international markets, they can expect which of the following domestic improvements?
content.question: Allocation of domestic resourcesStandard of livingSelf-sufficiency

topic.text: 1.3: Comparative Advantage and Gains from Trade

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
